name: Amazoness
author: bmsmota
notes: After 2 months without playing deicide to return for the wcs qualifiers saved up the gems up to 4000 but was tired of waiting so I build the amazoness deck and it wasn't a mistake, great deck, the massivemorphs were there only since legend 3 because of Eugen deck but didn't use them in the last 5 matches so completely replaceable.
